extension.summary: Frontend for MAME with the UMSA twist
extension.description:
https://umsa.info is based on MAME and it's Software Lists and combines all software ports, conversion, remakes and sometimes even unoffical ones.
*** Note *** Software is still in development and has bugs. This is a side project to showcase umsa.info and encourage other frontend authors to support it.
Thanks to MAMEdev, all support and artwork file authors especially AntoPisa, Kodi team and RCB add-on author malte.
